description: A Chef or Cook is responsible for using their culinary expertise to create appetizing dishes for diners to enjoy

recipes.cooking_method: Roasting is a slow-cooking process, using indirect, diffused heat to cook its ingredients. It is a dry-heat cooking method where hot air surrounds the food and cooks it evenly on all sides at a temperature of at least 300 °F (or 150 °C). The heat can also be derived from an open flame, an oven, or another heat source..

ingredients: 1 pound beef sirloin, sliced into thin strips
recipes.cooking_method: In a wok or large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over high heat.Add the beef and stir-fry until browned.Add the broccoli and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes.In a small bowl, mix together the cornstarch, soy sauce, and sesame oil.Add the sauce to the wok and stir-fry until the sauce thickens and coats the beef and broccoli

Preheat a grill or grill pan to high heat. Season the beef with salt and pepper.Grill the beef for 2-3 minutes per side, until browned.In a pot of boiling water, blanch the broccoli for 2-3 minutes.In a large skillet, heat the sauce over medium heat until it thickens.Add the beef and broccoli to the skillet and toss to coat in the sauce

description: A chef is a professional cook who is skilled in preparing and cooking a variety of dishes

recipes.cooking_method: In a mixing bowl, combine the ground pork, shrimp, green onions, and soy sauce.Spoon a small amount of the mixture into each wonton wrapper and fold it into a triangle or purse shape.In a large pot of boiling water, cook the wontons for 3-5 minutes or until they float to the surface.Serve hot with soy sauce or dipping sauce of your choice
